name: py-bravado-core

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
bravado-core is a Python library that adds client-side and server-side
support for the OpenAPI Specification v2.0.

dependencies.name: py-jsonref
dependencies.description: An implementation of JSON Reference for Python

dependencies.name: py-jsonschema
dependencies.description: Jsonschema: An(other) implementation of JSON Schema for Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pyrsistent
dependencies.description:
Pyrsistent is a number of persistent collections (by some referred to as
functional data structures). Persistent in the sense that they are
immutable.

dependencies.name: py-python-dateutil
dependencies.description: Extensions to the standard Python datetime module.

dependencies.name: py-pytz
dependencies.description: World timezone definitions, modern and historical.

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-simplejson
dependencies.description: Simplejson is a simple, fast, extensible JSON encoder/decoder for Python

dependencies.name: py-swagger-spec-validator
dependencies.description:
A Python library that validates Swagger Specs against the Swagger 1.2
or Swagger 2.0 specification.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependent_to.name: py-bravado
dependent_to.description:
Bravado is a Yelp maintained fork of digium/swagger-py for use with
OpenAPI Specification version 2.0 (previously known as Swagger).
